Class Semester

java.lang.Object
Semester
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Semester extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a semester
See Also:

    • Semester

      public Semester(double gpa, int credits, int semester)
      Constructs a Semester object with specified GPA, credits, and semester.
      Parameters:
      gpa - The GPA for the semester.
      credits - The credits earned in the semester.
      semester - The semester number.

      Add a mark for a specific subject to the semester.
      Parameters:
      subj - The subject for which the mark is added.
      mrk - The Mark object representing the student's performance.

    • setMarks

      public void setMarks(HashMap<String,Mark> marks)
      Set the marks for the semester using a HashMap.
      Parameters:
